outcome: Internal sabotage breaks citizen ID databases, erasing identities, and plunges city into identity chaos.

events.description: Confusion spreads within critical infrastructure agencies as identity validation systems display anomalies.
Residents report inability to access services due to unexplained ID validation failures.
Council acknowledges ID crisis, urging calm and enacts temporary measures for services access.
Technicians identify internal sabotage of ID databases; narrow down potential points of breach.
